name: MEC Centaurus 0C Sleeping Bag - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Get out for some exploring without spending your entire budget on gear. The Centaurus line uses quick-drying synthetic insulation for both value and reliable performance. Designed with thoughtful touches, it will make your nights better and keep your pack slim and light on the hike in. There's a zippered pocket on the draft tube, a 3/4-length zip and 2 loops that let you hang it to dry or air out in the morning.Insulated with Polyester HyperLoft  that contains recycled fibres.Outer shell fabric is Pertex Quantum nylon with a DWR treatment to shed moisture. Lining is nylon.Hood drawcord is operable with one hand.Pocket on the draft tube has an invisible zipper and fits glasses or a headlamp.3/4-length YKK® zipper helps trim the weight.2 hanging loops on the foot end.Includes a stuff sack and a home storage bag.

        Sustainability
